bad_gateway_error: Bad Gateway: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server
unauthorized_error: Unauthorized: Access is denied due to invalid credentials
forbidden_error: Forbidden: You do not have permission to access this resource
not_found_error: Not Found: The requested resource could not be found
internal_server_error: Internal Server Error: An unexpected error occurred on the server
bad_request_error: Bad Request: The server could not understand the request
service_unavailable_error: Service Unavailable: The server is currently unavailable
gateway_timeout_error: Gateway Timeout: The server did not receive a timely response
delete_cache_error: Something is wrong of deleting local data
network_error: Something is wrong with the connection
clear_cache_failed: Failed to delete cache. Please try again
